summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight fluctuations in pH and temperature.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain within 300-400 ppm for healthy growth.
Consider cooling measures if temperature exceeds 30°C to prevent stress on tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.185 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.338 / 23.56 / 28.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
